title: (08250) San Juan de Torruella - 5 C-55
description: Parking of sports facilities, flat and with shadows

title: (08250) Sant Joan de Vilatorrada - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08250) Sant Joan de Vilatorrada - Unnamed Road
description: Large plain surrounded by pine trees and views of the Montserrat mountain, in the heart of Pla del Bages. Super quiet

title: (08242) Manresa - 17 Plaça Bages
description: Quiet parking for sleeping. It is possible to get to the center a little bit, but there is a bus stop just al davant.

title: (08242) Manresa - 25I Carrer Verge de les Angustias
title_short: (08242) Manresa - 25I Carrer Verge de les Angustias
description: Large parking lot with a great view of Manresa. Looks like the parking lot is for a stadium/school. Water is NOT possible from November - March but seems to be free and accessible otherwise. Came by as a pedestrian but would’ve loved to visit with camper. Can’t see any signs that motor homes are prohibited (also a few campers are parked here). Otherwise nice place . And enjoy the view!

title: (08242) Manresa - s/n Carretera Santpedor
description: Parc de l'Agulla, free parking, visit of the park with restaurant, picnic area, children's area and walks

title: (08243) Manresa - 42 Avinguda dels Dolors
description: Laundry. Good area to park. Cafeteria ... Gas station ... LIDL nearby.

title: (08241) Manresa - Carretera de Sant Joan
description: New motorhome area next to the sports area. It has 6 delimited spaces, but there is much more space in the sports parking area. It has all the services.

title: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 7 Carretera Santpedor
title_short: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 7 Carretera Santpedor
description: Large parking lot next to an artificial lake with park and gardens. Very close to the C-25, but without noise.

title: (08241) Manresa - 8 Carrer Sol i Aire
description: Near a stadium, there are trails and it is about two kilometers from the historic center of Manresa. large, flat and quiet place. unpaved.

title: (08250) Sant Joan de Vilatorrada - 34 Masia Can Celdoni
title_short: (08250) Sant Joan de Vilatorrada - 34 Masia Can Celdoni
description: Fishing place, relax, great place to stay.

title: (08241) Manresa - Cal Estevet
description: Ground parking without services, near the Gorg blau in Manresa

title: (08243) Manresa - 24 Camí dels Tovots
description: Parking to rest a few hours

title: (08241) Manresa - Carrer Guia
description:
Santa Caterina Tower. Beautiful views of the city of Manresa. There is no service.
You can park easy. Quiet zone.

title: (08251) Santpedor - 5 Carrer Sant Francesc d'Assís
description: Very flat municipal parking lot. Very calm. Downtown. All kinds of shops nearby. Little shade. A certain capacity of 100 places. Suitable for large motorhomes.

title: (08251) Santpedor - 8B Carrer Roger de Flor
description: Municipal parking lot. Very central. A little noise during the day because adjacent to a busy street. Totally flat. Near places with public fountains. In front of the bar Aston (one of the best in the city). little shade There is a charger for electric vehicles managed by the town hall. Ideal for small vans and motorhomes. It does not have a height limiter. About 40 outdoor places.

title: (08243) Manresa - 62 Avinguda dels Països Catalans
description: Carrefour shopping center parking lot, Kentucky Fried Chicken, etc.

title: (08251) Santpedor - 1 Cami de les Arenes
description: Quiet picnic area with two tables perfect for stopping and following the route Next to a water channel and very shady Let's be respectful of the environment and pick up our rubbish so that they let us continue enjoying these sites

title: (08251) Santpedor - 153 Ronda Sant Pere
description: Street with parking spaces on both sides of the street, a quiet street both for parking during the day and for spending the night, next to roads to go for a walk or by bike, in the street below there is a park for the most kids with picnic tables

title: (08241) Manresa - 91 Carretera de Manresa al Xup
title_short: (08241) Manresa - 91 Carretera de Manresa al Xup
description: Oller del Mas Complex Parking. Quiet, flat but without services. Starting point of a route around the vineyards.

title: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 18 Avinguda Bertrand i Serra
title_short: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 18 Avinguda Bertrand i Serra
description: Ample public parking next to laundry and supermarket. Quiet, in the middle of the town. Big carpark next to laundry services and supermarket.

title: (08241) Manresa - 91 Carretera de Manresa al Xup
title_short: (08241) Manresa - 91 Carretera de Manresa al Xup
description: Very quiet place, next to Masia Mas del Oller. It has an indoor restaurant where you can eat very well at a good price. You cross the private parking that you have, and right in front of the road that crosses just a small river, you find an ideal space to spend the afternoon.

title: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 73 Carrer Jaume Balmes
title_short: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 73 Carrer Jaume Balmes
description: Laundry with free motor home car park 75 meters from the laundry. 4 washing machine of 8, 13 and 17 and 2 dryers of 17 kg.

title: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 51 Carrer Raval
title_short: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - 51 Carrer Raval
description: Free municipal parking, more than 50 spaces. Soccer field next door and 5 minutes walk from the town.

title: (08240) Manresa - 23 Carrer Casa Albertí
description: Pàrquing de l'ermita de Viladordis, s'està molt tranquil a la nit and is able to fer força walks

title: (08278) Sant Fruitós de Bages - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08278) Sant Fruitós de Bages - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the river, nobody accompanied by cicadas and water runoff. Place of ballad but after 21h nobody goes there. We had a fabulous night.

title: (08243) Manresa - 35 Carrer de Pau Miralda
description: Uneven ground parking without services, quiet area in the Bufalvent industrial estate. Right at the entrance of the Parc del Secà. Views to Montserrat

title: (08243) Manresa - 16 Carrer del Romaní
description: Completely just above the counts, there is only one ac

title: (08278) Sant Fruitós de Bages - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08278) Sant Fruitós de Bages - Unnamed Road
description: The second time we spend the night here, a quiet, flat place, right next to the river, a group of cyclists and little more during the week, on the weekends a lot of people gather (we were on Saturday and we saw it)

title: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - Unnamed Road
description: Secluded and quiet place, with the possibility of shade. Not easy but feasible access.

title: (08259) Fonollosa - BV-3008
description: Parking surrounded by pine trees. Without service. Follow the indication "fals towers"

title: (08240) Manresa - Ronda Exterior de Manresa
description: Large free parking lot, lots of places, very quiet and nice views of the hills and an old factory, in front of a railway but not a lot of train

title: (08254) El Pont de Vilomara - 140 Carrer Jesus
title_short: (08254) El Pont de Vilomara - 140 Carrer Jesus
description: Picnic area and in the polygon 100 metro parking with self-service gasoline to spend the night and surrounded by mountain routes

title: (08253) El Calvet - 4 Carrer Sant Marc
description: Picturesque and very nice picnic area, it has 4 tables with benches and lots of trees, you can park next to it, perfect for stopping along the way and eating.

title: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - s/n de Bages
title_short: (08272) Sant Fruitós de Bages - s/n de Bages
description: Ideal car park to visit the monestir of Sant Benet del Bages.

title: (08650) Barcelona - 32 Avinguda països catalans
description: Parking in the Pla del Mas estate. quiet area with industrial buildings on both sides. area where a truck also spends the night. Level dirt floor and paved streets around with trees.

title: (08259) Fonollosa - 16 Carrer del Torrent
description: Parking with shade, play area next to it with fountain, ideal for a stopover to eat.

title: (08270) Navarcles - 1 Carrer Font de la Cura
title_short: (08270) Navarcles - 1 Carrer Font de la Cura
description: Llac de Navarcles car park. Fairly flat parking lot on the river side. Good alternative if the AC area is full as it is small. There is no service in the parking lot.

title: (08270) Navarcles - Carrer Font de Santa Margarida
title_short: (08270) Navarcles - Carrer Font de Santa Margarida
description: Free municipal area, on the outskirts of the city. Space with good shadows. A few meters away, you can walk around a small and pretty lake. To have electricity call the phone number indicated.

title: (08270) Navarcles - 10 Camí de l'Angla
description: Shaded place with a fountain and two picnic tables. Possibility of overnight without problems. Near the industrial estate and with walking routes from the place.

title: (08270) Navarcles - BV-1221
description: Nice place to stop for a night and surrounded by nature.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - 2 Carrer Via Augusta
description: Small path along the water. It has a railway line on the other side of the river but not disturbing. It is a dead end so it's quiet ... reserved for vans because narrow dirt road.

title: (08650) Sallent - 39 Carrer els Plans de la Sala
title_short: (08650) Sallent - 39 Carrer els Plans de la Sala
description: Service area in hotel/restaurant parking

address.street: 39 Carrer els Plans de la Sala

title: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - 31 Carrer de les Alzines
title_short: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - 31 Carrer de les Alzines
description: Playground for children with 2 picnic tables, and a cultural tour. At the end of a dead end.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - 2 Carrer Via Augusta
description: Small peaceful green area by the river. No convenience, easy access, fishing. A very calm night. Railroad nearby but not disturbing at all.

title: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - 6 Carrer de Marganell
title_short: (08253) Sant Salvador de Guardiola - 6 Carrer de Marganell
description: Parking of the sports center. asphalted, level squares. Without services. We have been very calm.

title: (08297) Castellgalí - Buzón 230
description: Parking and sports area of the city, well lit, very quiet. 10 minutes from the center of the village. Zone and small football field.

title: (08297) - 2A Carrer Maria Aurèlia Capmany
description: To make a stop along the way. there is a picnic area and a lot of paved parking. It's not flat

title: (08297) Castellgalí -
description: New motorhome area, free, with water and emptying, near municipal swimming pool, gym, camping area and municipal hostel. Possibility of walks and shops in the town and nearby restaurants 5 min walking.

title: (08650) Sallent de Llobregat - 2 Eix del Llobregat
title_short: (08650) Sallent de Llobregat - 2 Eix del Llobregat
description: Motorway rest area with toilets available at the gas station

title: (08253) San Salvador de Guardiola - 14 BV-1102
description: Parking of the church of San Salvador de Guardiola. Peaceful place overlooking Montserrat. No services. Small vehicle only.

title: (08650) Sallent - 24 Carrer Dos-Cents Onze
description:
Service area in Sallent, in the Botjosa neighbourhood, right on the premises of the Geoparc de la Catalunya Central Visitor Center, open weekends and holidays in the morning.
Wide and level area, with 3 marked spaces and with a wheel stop, to park and spend the night, although there is space for many more.
Payment point for emptying and recharging water (€2 - 5 minutes with a bank card).
Ideal area to visit the Iberian settlement of Cogulló, La Síquia, signposted BTT routes or the wetland and riverside forests of the Aigüamolls de la Corbatera at the passage of the Llobregat river.
At 100 mt there is a restaurant and a gas station.
The area is not close to the town (2km, although you can go well by bicycle) but right at the entrance of the town there is the institute area with plenty of space to park and spend the night, with an Esclat supermarket and a bar-restaurant a few meters away .
The town center is just 500mt. Sunday is market day and some shops are open.
Safe place due to the proximity of the neighborhood.

title: (08251) Castellnou de Bages - 2 Carrer Diputacio
description: Land parking next to the Castellnou de Bages town hall. Very nice town and you can make excursions on trails. There is a fountain nearby and recycling bins. Very quiet place.

title: (08260) Súria - 33 Carretera de Manresa
description: Great parking at the very entrance of the city, in front of the Bonpreu supermarket. There is no shadow. Better space than the other car park listed in this guide.

title: (08650) Cabrianes - s/n Carrer Soldevila
description: Small friendly place to stop with games for children.

title: (08254) Rocafort -
description: Space for 3 or 4 campers, some under shade, next to the Rocafort castle (under restoration) and very close to the town of the same name. It is outside the limits of the Sant Llorenç del Munt i Serra de l'Obac Natural Park, so there should be no problems staying overnight as long as it is done with the respect that the place deserves.

title: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - 16 Carrer Gran
title_short: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - 16 Carrer Gran
description: Cheap prices and good service.

title: (08260) Súria - 12 Carrer de Mercè Rodoreda
description: Esplanade without services within the town

title: (08650) Sallent - La Fàbrica
description: Viewpoint and picnic area. Very nice

title: (08650) Sallent - 5 Carrer Girona
description: Quiet area, with an Esclat and bar at 100m, at 600mt from the town, it is possible to park during the day and at night.

title: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Passatge dels Catalans
title_short: (08295) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Passatge dels Catalans
description: New area in the city center, near the sports pavilion and the municipal swimming pool. Location very well connected by train and bus to visit Montserrat, Manresa and surroundings.  Dog are allowed on the caravan area but they should stay off playground. its also a nice dog park to use 2 meter away. you have dog bags for feces on the place, so please keep the dog park clean.

name: Camping La Tatgera
title: (08278) Camping La Tatgera
description: Large campsite, very few people, being renovated, currently one toilet/shower building open, location is stunning on top of mountains with beautiful sunset. Nice swimming pool, restaurant.

title: (08278) Talamanca -
description: Next to the shelter and next to the closed campsite there is a parking lot where you can spend the night

title: (08650) Sallent - 49 Carrer Santa Cristina
description: It is a public car park on the banks of the Llobregat with a warning of “attention to the floods”, I suppose they will do it to heal in Health because during my stay the level was very low and there was no danger. It is in the same town, a short distance (about 5 minutes walk) from the town hall square. All shops in the town are 5 minutes walk. It is a place to spend the night or a rest day. There is a source of drinking water at the entrance of the parking

title: (08650) Sallent -
description: Installations at the La Torre d'en Roca car park. Agrobotiga i restaurant. Free parking, electricity and water. Bones instal·lacions i molt tranquil.

title: (08650) Sallent - 8 Camí del Pal
description: Wide open field with good access for large motorhomes. Without services but with the town 2 minutes away.

name: Camping Montserrat
title: (08255) Camping Montserrat
description: Camping Montserrat. Super quiet campsite with splendid views of the Montserrat mountain. It is new, perfect facilities, very clean. Large pool. Highly recommended!!!!

title: (08259) Fonollosa - 7 Carrer Major
description: Space for 4 or 5 motorhomes in front of the town hall of Fonollosa.

title: (08296) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Sant Vicenç de Castellet - Unnamed Road
description: A place surrounded by nature, beautiful view to the mountains (Montserrat). We just made a stop there and didn't spend the night but it seems possible to stay overnight. You can just reach it with 4x4.

title: (08298) Marganell - 109 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
title_short: (08298) Marganell - 109 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
description: Small picnic area with a table. Ideal for a stop along the way. Views of Monserrat. There is a bigger parking lot right in front that belongs to the restaurant.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - 651 C-55
description: Amazing place on top of Mt. At the top there is a swing and incredible views. Better to go up with a 4x4 but you can also go up with a normal vehicle if the road is not wet. The path is quite steep. Close to the Turó del Marques via ferrata and several routes.

title: (08271) Artés - 80 Carrer Barcelona
description: Laundry in the center of town. It can be difficult to find a place to park nearby if there is a football or basketball game or training sessions in the afternoon. You can only pay in cash.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - 1 Camí del Burés
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - 1 Camí del Burés
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Perfect for about 5 campers

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Magical place mentioned in the comments of the other nearby location. Access to the latter is via a somewhat stony track but which seems sufficiently smooth for Vans and small campers. The view over Montserrat is truly magical and gives you the impression of being alone in the world. Absolute calm and cleanliness. Please leave the place, leaving it as clean as you found it.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar -
description: A nice place easily accessible with some ground clearance. Of course, you shouldn't shy away from scratches in the paintwork in the wild either. Much lonelier than the other places below and a much nicer view.

title: (08269) Valls de Torroella - 63 Diseminado Valls
description: Place in the middle of nature but next to the C-55 highway (only downhill to Manresa). There is a road next to it that leads to the town of Valls de Torroella, 2 minutes from basic services.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - C-1411a
description: Pàrquing perfecte per fer L'excursió del Torrent dels Abadals and el turó del Marques

title: (08256) Castellar - 1 Urbanitzacio SUD-1 Castellar
description: Just a honest and straightforward rest area. Nice quiet and flat gravel parking just outside the motorway. Perfect for a meal or just resting from travel. Respect nature and leave a clean site.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - BV-1122
description: Great place, very quiet and with views of Montserrat.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Accessibility with 12to also no problem. There were no prohibition signs. Cleanliness should be mandatory. It goes without saying that no fire is made

title: (08660) Balsareny - 5 Carrer del Trull
description: Free public parking in the town of Balsareny, in a quiet area, near the church square but with little passage of people and cars. Completely flat, a quiet place where you can spend the night perfectly, without camping. In the town there are some supermarkets and shops within 5 minutes, also several bars and restaurants. The casino bar is right on the street above the parking lot and has a very nice terrace with good views and you can eat well. From the car park you can take a walking excursion to Castell de Balsareny or a walk to the Llobregat river and La Resclosa dels Manresans, where you can see birds.

title: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08296) Castellbell i el Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Place with unbeatable views of Montserrat. The downside is that to access this site you have to drive on a dirt road with a somewhat complicated section.

title: (08296) Castellbell y Vilar - 38 E-9
description: I calm down, the two bones you dress Montserrat. We haven't slept there, but I guess that's a no-brainer. Note: Dirt road with some stones!

title: (08660) Balsareny - 1 Placa del Rector Roc Garcia
title_short: (08660) Balsareny - 1 Placa del Rector Roc Garcia
description: Free parking near the church

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice parking space right on the edge of a road through the mountains. 4x4 makes it easier, but you can also do without. Great view of the mountains. Nice and clean so take your rubbish with you.
Not suitable for large mobile homes. rather VW buses or SUVs

title: (08278) Mura -
description: Nice views of Mura from the top. other perspectives of this wonderful town. I have spent one night in this place, there is a small flatter area and another with the views of nura, not so flat but I have leveled it well with a stone. the place is cool but Mura being a tourist town arouses envy of course because from the town they see that you are with the Camper on top of everything. So far no one has come to tell me anything. great weekend outing, good place to walk with pets and children. a motorhome does not go up but a Camper does.

title: (08278) Mura - 3 Carrer Francesc Toran-ur el Peri
title_short: (08278) Mura - 3 Carrer Francesc Toran-ur el Peri
description: Quiet parking to visit the town, we have spent a night watching TV, there is coverage with the phone there is no shade but we have been alone

title: (08278) Mura - 1 Carrer Poligono 4
description: It is the parking lot of the Mura cemetery. The main road is very close but nothing has bothered us. There is room for 3/4 vehicles. It is very accessible. No services

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 9 BP-1121
description: Small place facing the hands of Montserrat. We stayed the night without any problem (in April). Sound of the waterfall below. A few cars at night. Train line that no longer operates between 22:30 and 06:30

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Picnic area on the road to the monastery. Nice view on the Montains. 2 tables with benches.

title: (08278) Talamanca - BV-1221
description: An area of land next to the mountain road. Incredible views of the area and the Montserrat mountain in the background. The road does not have a lot of traffic, so it makes the place very quiet. Near Mura, a mandatory stop.

title: (08278) Mura - 5 Carrer Ca l'Arola
description: Quiet place with good views and sunset in Mura to park day and night. It is near the road but there are almost no cars.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description: Industrial zone, quiet; no services

title: (08199) Marganell - BP-1121
description: Nice flat area on the side of a track just off the road. Amazing views of the rock formations. Hidden from sight, quiet with only church bells waking you up in the morning! Not suitable for large motorhome but 4x4 or van ideal (track not rough)

title: (08298) Marganell - BP-1103
description: Level lay by with space for 1 vehicle

title: (08294) El Bruc - 1 BP-1103
description: Large parking 50 meters from the BP1103 road that leads to the Monastery of Montserrat. No service but exceptional view of the valley, the Pyrenees and the famous rocks. Had a very quiet night.

title: (08298) Marganell - 100 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
title_short: (08298) Marganell - 100 Camí de Marganell a Montserrat
description: Quiet place with spectacular views of the mountains. Directions in paved side street.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 93 Carrer de Juliȧ Fuchs
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 93 Carrer de Juliȧ Fuchs
description: Bus parking for the Montserrat cog railway. Monistrol Vila station. To go there follow P1. Free day and night. Possibility of taking the train to go up to Montserrat. Superb.

title: (08278) Mura - 87 Carrer Poligono 7
description: Quiet and safe parking to leave the car and visit the town!

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Exceptional vantage point over the valley and the mountains. Montserrat in the background. A peaceful place to spend the night. You can hear the street, but only faintly. Beautiful sunset.

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Place with a great view right on the street which is quiet at night.

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Free parking with a great view, very quiet at night, ideal for visiting Montserrat early in the morning before the crowds arrive. Just below, the car parks of the Santa Cecilia monastery are quieter and accessible in the off season.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - BP-1121
description: Beautiful place overlooking the mountain in front of Monserrat. Quiet to stay.

title: (08263) Sant Mateu de Bages - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08263) Sant Mateu de Bages - Unnamed Road
description: Castelltallat Observatory, casal restaurant 500 m.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - C 55
description: Mixed parking lot with small picnic area. Faucet for refueling, waste water channel, emptying the toilet. Located on the main road, very noisy.

title: (08298) Marganell - 5 BP-1103
description: Small parking at the edge of a low road at this season. Nice view on the valley and the massif of Montserrat. There are many other car parks along the road but this one has a water point just across the road to fill cans and bottles.

title: (08275) Calders - 17P Carrer del Puig
description: Municipal Motorhome Area. You will also have electricity shortly. When it is complete you can spend the night at 400 m in "Les Escomes" and use the services of the Area.

title: (08294) El Bruc - BP-1103
description: Ravine with spectacular views towards the horizon. In front there is a beautiful little hill and if you look back you can see part of the Montserrat Mountain. The Pyrenees are also perfectly visible on the horizon. Brutal landscape!

title: (08275) Calders - Zona Esportiva Les Escomes
description: The city council has begun the construction of an area with services in "El Puig". I will inform you when it is in operation. In the area of "El Puig" there will only be space for 4 motor homes. This place located 400 meters from the area under construction is a quiet place and alternative to the area under construction. The Urban Guàrdia allows to spend the night.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Avinguda de l'Abat Escarré
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - Avinguda de l'Abat Escarré
description: Parking near the sports field. We spent the night from Saturday to Sunday quite quiet. There are no services. To park and go to the assault of the path leading to the Monastery of Montserrat. Near the village.

title: (08199) Marganell - BP-1121
description: Place next to the road that offers Monestir de Montserrat. There is an abandoned hotel 1.4 km from the monastery.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 112 Carrer de la Trinitat
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 112 Carrer de la Trinitat
description: Perfect spot to start hikes to the monastery. Quite during the night!

title: (08294) El Bruc - BP-1101
description: Parking can Massana, where they start many routes to Montserrat. Picnic area. Fantastic view.

title: (08278) Talamanca -
description: Nice place To spend a quiet night, not too windy and almost flat. cell ok

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 11 BP-1121
description: Parking is complicated, the lot is a bit uneven, but the view is nice. Very near street. Except for a few cars at night, relatively quiet. Free and not far from the monastery. There is space for 3-4 campers.

title: (08269) Navàs - C-55
description: By the roadside, a path that goes down to the river, sites all along this path, we hear a little road, but it's quiet.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 11 BP-1121
description: Parking for visiting the Monastery of Montseratte.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - BP-1103
description: Quiet place to spend the day and make routes through the area, 1 km walk along the road to the Montserrat Monastery (20 eur is worth parking inside). There are tables and benches to eat.

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 8 Carrer Travessera del Pi
title_short: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 8 Carrer Travessera del Pi
description: Quiet place to sleep near a house in the urbanization

title: (08671) Navàs - Carretera Castelladral
description: Place with narrow access but suitable for 2/35 motorhomes, parking for 8 vehicles, spectacular views of Monserrat, orientation circuit with three distances, 3km / 5.3km and 8.1km. Restaurant 100mt.

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 36 E-9
description:
Area of Montserrat
We have stopped to eat in the car. The restaurant is temporarily closed.
Area of trucks and others next to gas station.
I do not know if you can stay overnight.

title: (08671) Navàs - Carretera Castelladral
description: Parking of the tiny Castelladral municipality. Spectacular views, fountain in the town square, youth hostel and a small climbing area.

description: Wide street perfect for parking AC and being able to visit the town, rest, spend the day and go hiking.

title: (08279) Avinyó - Unnamed Road
description: Fountain in the middle of nature, very quiet place, with a playground and many picnic tables. Large, flat car park.

title: (25287) Pinós - 25 C-55

title: (08294) El Bruc - B-110
description: Montserrat Nature Park

title: (08279) Avinyó - 2 Plaça
description: Area with tables and benches, next to the stream, with a fountain and a large parking lot. Do not stay overnight, very rapid and dangerous rise in water.

title: (08199) Monestir de Montserrat - Unnamed Road
description:
Montserrat is interesting in two points of view, it is a sumptuous monastery located in a natural park composed of quite spectacular mountains.
Vast parking with beautiful views. The guards propose to approach their building at the end of the day in the parking lot (very flat) once they have left, in order to provide us with better protection. ("In case of problem, you honk and intervene ...").

title: (08278) Mura - 12 BV-1221
description: Site to spend the night! near a chasm

title: (08294) El Bruc - B-111
description: Picnic area with two long tables and two benches overlooking the mountains of Montserrat. Very good place to rest and with very nice views.

title: (08278) Mura - 15 BV-1221
description: Parking in the Sant Llorenç del Munt Natural Park, between weeks because few people go there and it's super quiet, lots of people on weekends, toilets during the day next to the park

description: Salo, BV-3002. Camping Cal Paradis

title: (08691) Monistrol de Montserrat - 15 C-55
description: Ground parking located right next to the cable car to go up to Montserrat. Not ideal for sleeping because there is the road right next

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 10 Carrer de les Margarides
description: Parking in front of the Instituto de Vacarisses. It has quite large battery parking lots where a normal motorhome can fit without having to park badly. To spend the night on holidays or school vacations it is perfect, quiet and safe. You can hear the passing of cars on the national road, but it is a good solution to spend the night.

title: (08294) El Bruc -
description: Quiet place, next to the restaurant. Hiking and climbing area.

title: (08294) El Bruc - B-111
description: Parking, no service, but very quiet to sleep. In front of the monument Bruc.A at the foot of Montserrat.

title: (08279) Avinyó - 11 Carrer Industria
description: Municipal area, free parking, chargeable services

title: (08672) L'Ametlla de Merola - 14 Carrer Vell
description: Parking in an industrial colony. For small vans. Maybe in some area I could park some AC. Nearby there is a bridge and in the same neighborhood there is a bar, fountain, playground.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 18 Carrer de l'1 d'Octubre
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 18 Carrer de l'1 d'Octubre
description: This is a new parking area on the edge of El Bruc with great access to the natural park. All but the biggest campers could fit and there’s a choice of sunny & shady parking spots. A water tap is just by the entrance and there’s bins over the road (near the other park4night). Please be respectful and don’t overstay your welcome.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 88 Carrer de Bruc del Mig
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 88 Carrer de Bruc del Mig
description: Free parking, great place

title: (08294) El Bruc - Unnamed Road
description: Parking Can Jorba in Montserrat, near the restaurant Vinyanova, near the sector of climbing can jorba, without services not water, quiet at night and with good views of the mountain.

title: (08279) Avinyó - BP-4313
description:
Not very glamorous, but just for
a motorway exit given the lack of surface in Spain.

Do not spend the night here, better go to the area of the town of Avinyó.

Busy area for Cruissing.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera -
description: Repsol gas station with truck parking and some smaller spaces for vans. attached to the road so there is noise from cars and trucks going by all the time.

title: (08719) Castellolí - 11 Avinguda de la Unió
description:
Dirt parking, in the village, next to the highway. I have spent a quiet night.
There is a bakery less than 3min walk away where they make breakfast and lunch.

title: (08212) Sant Llorenç Savall - Unnamed Road
description: Vall d'Horta and The frame of the rocks. Free without service. Final stretch by dirt track. The parking lot is the last in the valley, there are others before but this one is at the end. Forbidden night.

title: (08294) El Bruc - 2 Carrer Bruc de Baix
title_short: (08294) El Bruc - 2 Carrer Bruc de Baix
description: Car park suitable for making a stop along the way with a view of the Montserrat mountain, it is very close to the highway and the noise of cars can be heard, but to rest for a while it is an open field of land with easy access

title: (08233) Vacarisses - 54 Carrer Josep Carner
description: Quiet place, outside Barcelona, it is not beautiful but it is convenient for those who arrive late in the evening and want to stay out of the chaos of the city without traveling too many kilometers. There is a grove alongside and a water fountain

title: (08293) Monistrol de Montserrat - B-112
description: Shaded car park with a few flat spaces, above the Tourist Office on the Coves road. Large picnic area with toilets and barbecue areas. Start of hikes and access to climbing areas. Very calm. Path closed at night.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera - 4 BV 1033
description: Very large parking lot in front of the town hall. During the day the noise of the traffic of the C-25 is heard, at night it is more subtle. There is a restaurant next door, but it must be on weekends and there is a basketball basket in front of the social premises. No shade, but with nice wind. Containers only available to neighbors and no bins in the vicinity. All the wooded area without papers or samples of our passage through the place, keep it up. He passed the city hall van and didn't tell us anything. The GR7 passes through the town and the surroundings are flat, perfect for easy cycling. The climb to Castell de Boixadors, Durilla, about 500m of unevenness.

title: (08293) Collbató -
description: We stopped here one night in the middle of the cypresses. view towards Montserrat, drinking water fountain opposite the church a few minutes walk. from here you can leave for various paths and caves, watch out for mosquitoes in the evening.

title: (08293) Collbató - 1 Passeig Ronda
description: Public parking in the village. Very wide and without slopes. Quiet night. Without shadow. Without services. Close to supermarket and shops. Sunday weekly market.

title: (08293) Collbató - 52 Carrer d'Amadeu Vives
description: Parking lot between the library and the entrance to the castle. sloping at the front, a bit straight at the top of the boules pitch. Water at the entrance to the library. quiet at night.

title: (08294) El Bruc Residencial - A-2
description: Via de servei aprop de montserrat amb dutxes, sink, electricity and quiet. It is next to the highway but as a last resort it could be useful for sleeping

title: (08261) - 24 Barri Colonia Manuela
description: New space for motorhomes. With newly planted trees. Little shade. With litter bins and drainage area and drinking water. Luxury castle view. Good WiFi.

title: (08293) Collbató - 8 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: 41.567405,1.823625 Great place to spend the night, very quiet. A 5-minute walk from town, with a bakery, pharmacy, hiking or cycling trails, supermarkets, Sunday market, sports center and monuments all nearby. A little further down, between the playground and the skate park, there is also a drinking water point. We spent the night very quietly, with no height restrictions, no shade or servants but with the peace of sleeping at the foot of Montserrat mountain. A pleasure that we will definitely repeat. My AC of 7.40 meters and 3.20 meters high. GREAT.

title: (08719) Rubió - 9 BV-1031
description: Isolated and quiet place to spend the night, with good views of Igualada at the top of the hill, accessible slope

title: (08293) Collbató - 14 Passeig la Fumada
description: Site are services very close to the town. Ideal to spend a quiet night close to everything away from everything at the same time.

title: (08692) Cal Riera -
description: Next to the Castle, several places next to a very flat road, between trees, there are picnic tables and garbage next to the Castle, in the middle of August very very quiet

title: (08230) Matadepera - BV-1221
description: Parking next to the road, you can not stay overnight. There is no service.

title: (08281) Sant Pere Sallavinera - Unnamed Road
description: Old aviation field of Sant Pere. Alta Segarra area surrounded by Nature

title: (08719) Rubió -
description:
Several places on the service roads of the Rubió wind farm where you can park and take a good walk with some brutal views. There are no trash cans or garbage containers, take your garbage and don't leave it here (as the couples who come to "get intimate" here do) so that we can all continue to enjoy it.
Impressive to see the mills so close.

title: (08261) Cardona - 3 Carrer Mestre Pompeu Fabra
description: Parking next to the football field very quiet, free services, very close to the center of the beautiful Cardona. People are very generous. Do not miss the visit to the mountains of the city museum nearby. Swimming pool.

title: (08293) Collbató - Autovia del Nord-Est
description: It's a hidden place in between olive trees. No water or toilets. Nice view, but close to the highway.

title: (08261) Cardona - 506 Lloc Parador Nacional Turisme
description: Parking just under the castle. For the night. Bathroom.

title: (08183) -
description: Parking at the entrance of the town of Granera. It is located at the back of the Hermitage of Santa Cecilia and town cemetery. It has garbage containers at 100m and a public fountain at 300mt in the town. There is also a Bar / Restaurant in the village. Very quiet area to spend a weekend and visit the area as its castle or excursion to the Dolmen of Truillas.

title: (08711) Òdena - 87 Avinguda de Manresa
description: Off the road just in front of the main road, motorhomes enter, ideal for the night, the only thing is the noise of cars but at night it is quieter. It is well located 5min walking from the church and 10min from the castle.

title: (08212) San Lorenzo Savall -
description: Esplanade on 2 levels to park, close to the urban center and very quiet. There are no services only recycling station. Near playground

title: (08261) Cardona - 17B Passeig de Mossèn Joan Riba
title_short: (08261) Cardona - 17B Passeig de Mossèn Joan Riba
description: Bivouac with source of drinking water

title: (08711) Òdena - 2 Carrer la Torre
description: Parking in front of the castle of Odena, ideal for the night, very quiet, there are garbage containers nearby and the fountain of the castle with drinking water at 15 meters, beautiful views of the castle, with the possibility of guided tour. the town center 10min walking. No height limit.

name: Camping L'Hostalet
title: (08673) Camping L'Hostalet
description: Camping Masía L'Hostalet. Camping in nature, ideal to go with children as there is a playground and a small farm that you can visit, it has a bar with a fireplace for cold winter days, and the owners are very nice, they have a small shop, for an emergency it's fine

title: (08230) Matadepera - 3 Carrer de Bell Camp
description: Ground parking next to a street in a quiet residential area. Hiking trails begin. very quiet place in the forest and easy access.

title: (08292) Esparreguera - Carrer del Tallaferro
description: Quiet place to spend the night, close to the motorway exit, but you don't hear it. It is located between a forest and an industrial area. Our night from Saturday to Sunday was very quiet with no noise, but during the week I don't know if there is noise at night. Ideal place to make a stopover if you want to continue the next day.

title: (08281) Els Prats de Rei - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08281) Els Prats de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place with easy access and good views. The tables are made of stone and lack shade. good place to rest even if there is nothing around. Barely no shade. eye dd face summer

title: (08212) Sant Llorenç Savall - 3 Avinguda Fuente Aixeta
title_short: (08212) Sant Llorenç Savall - 3 Avinguda Fuente Aixeta
description: Quiet parking near the center perfect to spend the night.

title: (08230) Matadepera - 3D Diseminado la Mateta
description: Parking next to the Matadepera cemetery, there is a sign indicating that you can only circulate from 9-19, during the cemetery opening hours. We spent the night here, the local police came because the cemetery alarm went off but they didn't tell us anything about sleeping here. Some walkers and cyclists in the morning, but the night was super quiet. Without services.

title: (08180) Moià - Unnamed Road
description: Sand quietly surrounded by nature, possibility of climbing and hiking. without services.

title: (25287) Vallmanya - Unnamed Road
description: Fantastic point from where you can see everything towards the four cardinal points. perfect for sleeping with barbecue

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - s/n Carrer de l'Urgell
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - s/n Carrer de l'Urgell
description: It is the car park of the Olesa de Montserrat sports center. There is always room. From here there are routes for walking and walking with the dog. Very quiet area at night. A little further up the path there is a fountain where you can drink or fill 1.5l bottles of water. Due to the type of trickle source, I don't think they can fill bottles. If you feel like it, you can pay to enter the indoor pool or the summer pool.

title: (08673) Barcelona - BV-4235
description: Unobstructed view of the mountains, very very quiet place at the foot of the Sant Miguel church, ideal for sleeping in nature far from everything.

title: (08700) Igualada - 68 Carrer de Carles Riba
description: Nice and quiet place in Igualada. Near the public swimming pool. It’s a recently built public parking. The spots are wide. There is a park next to it.

title: (08225) Terrassa - Unnamed Road
description:
Very peaceful spot to park around Barcelone, wide view on the mountains, wild goats and sheeps. There is a little lake and wheat fields around. Locals coming here to relax in the afternoon and run/bike. Quiet at night.
~2 flat spots. 
The road to come is not the best but we manage with a big van

title: (08719) Rubió - 4 BV-1037
description: Parking with picnic tables surrounded by small mountains, in a flat parking, then in unequal parking. Maybe something gloomy is next to the cemetery, but should the calm be? Small fountain near the cemetery. Castillo de Rubió to visit with restaurant in skirt. Visited a day of work, maybe busy on the weekends. Hiking and cycling routes

title: () Terrassa -
description: Site on the outskirts of Terrassa, quiet to spend the night, during the day some trucks, cars, cyclists and people can pass by

title: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 66 Carrer de Lluís Puigjaner
title_short: (08640) Olesa de Montserrat - 66 Carrer de Lluís Puigjaner
description: Drinking water fountain with good jet

title: (08640) Barcelona - 11 Carrer del Vapor Cremat
description: Gas station with free water service.

title: (08211) Les Arenes -
description: A very nice place. The night was calm, you can hear the road in the distance but in the evening there is not much traffic. There is a river below and a spring/fountain next to it.

title: (08700) Igualada - 2 Carrer França
description: Parking with very good location, with gardens and fountain.

title: (08700) Igualada - 82 Avinguda del Mestre Montaner
description: Bonpreu Esclat car park open 24 hours a day with a shop at night and on holidays, water hose and gas station, restaurants nearby

title: (08700) Igualada - Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau
title_short: (08700) Igualada - Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau
description: Gravel parking space right next to the highway (25m). Perfect if you are passing through and just want to sleep. Pedestrians, joggers and cyclists and sometimes a car drives through.

address.street: Cami de la Font de Can Masarnau

title: (08211) Castellar del Vallès -

title: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 21 Carrer Aureli Roviralta
title_short: (08781) Els Hostalets de Pierola - 21 Carrer Aureli Roviralta
description: It is in the town but it is a quiet area to sleep.

title: (08700) Igualada - Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Free municipal parking next to the gas station and 5 minutes from downtown. You can not park from 23 to 6 hours

title: (08700) Igualada - 21 Carrer de Lleida
description: Laundromat open every day 8am - 11pm, dryer and washing machine, costs 5-9 euros

title: (08292) Esparreguera - 13 Carrer de Sant Joan
description: Self-service laundry. You have a blue zone right in front of you. The first 30 minutes of the blue zone are free by entering the license plate in the machine. And there is also a loading and unloading area right in front of the laundry room. It goes either with cash or with the laundry recharge card. At the moment there is no option to pay by card.

title_short: (08787) La Pobla de Claramunt - 12 Avinguda Catalunya

description:
15 minutes drying 
 Extra machine for animal blankets etc

title: (08700) Igualada - 64 Carrer del Bisbe Robuster
description: Parking day and night on the outskirts of Igualada, without services, without height limit. nearby a soccer field.

title: (25287) Pinós - Unnamed Road
description: The center of Catalunya, Rosa dels vents, you can see impressive 360 views, sleep peacefully and a hostel on the coast that is super menja !!!

title: (08232) Viladecavalls - 52 Camí de la Plana
